system_template_text_preprocessing: This is an extracted page from a PDF document. Follow the steps below in order.
Step 1: Analyze the page layout and separate it into two columns. You will find that one column contains a very brief summary of the other. Discard the brief summary column entirely.
Step 2: Extract the original column. Analyze the text. Remove unnecessary new line characters and structure the text for readability.
Step 4: Remove the first line if it is 'The Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka'.
